episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_010:
The opening ceremony for the next
Neo Champion Stadium is about to begin!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_020:
Neo Champions are sync pairs who set an
example for others on Pasio to measure
up to...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_030: I wonder who’ll be chosen this time.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_040:
It’s hard to tell! After all, it’s not just about
winning Pokémon battles. They might judge
what’s in your heart, too!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_050:
For Rosa and Nate, it was “the power to
touch the hearts of others”...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_060:
And Cheren and Bianca were chosen for
their definition of strength.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_070:
I gotta get stronger—so I can be on their
level!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_080:
You’re more fired up than usual. That’s so
you, Hilda.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_110:
Not to N and Alder, who showed Arceus
their strong bonds.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_120: And this might sound kind of ambitious, but...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_130:
I also wanna keep growing, so I can protect
this world we all live in together!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_140:
I’m not as concerned about fancy titles.
Those can come later.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_150: Oh, really? You’re not interested in titles?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_160:
Then I guess I’ll just snatch up the
Neo Champion title this time!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4001_1001_170:
Hey, you know that’s not what I meant!
I don’t wanna lose to you either!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/6801_1001_010:
As Neo Champions, let’s create a future
for all of us!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/6801_1001_020:
Yeah! Let’s get out there and have some
more battles!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/6801_1001_030:
I’m glad you never change, Hilda, no matter
your titles.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_010: Let a new Neo Champion Stadium begin!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_020:
I’ve been appointed head judge for
this round.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_030:
I will, of course, also enlist the help of Iris
and Alder.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_040:
Without further ado, allow me to announce
this tournament’s judging criteria.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_050:
The theme is...“a future for people and
Pokémon to live in.”
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_060:
Thanks to people, Pokémon can draw out
their true power.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_070:
And with Pokémon by their side, people can
travel to worlds unknown.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_080:
That is the ideal future Neo Champions
should lead people and Pokémon toward.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_090:
Thus, in this competition, I’d like to find
sync pairs who give me hope for the future!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_100:
Everyone! Please show us judges your love
for people and Pokémon!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4002_1001_110: That love that spells hope for the future!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_010: A future for people and Pokémon to live in?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_020:
All right! Let’s show those judges what
we’ve got!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_040:
N’s the head judge, so we’ve gotta show
him how serious we are!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_080:
Then...I better get started! I’m off for some
training!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_100: Hilda sure seems excited about this one!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1001_110:
I’ve gotta keep up! Now, who can I get
to train with m—
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1101_120:
We interrupt this program with
breaking news!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1101_130:
A flurry of unforeseen snow has been
spotted in an area on Pasio.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4003_1101_140:
Authorities report no malfunctions with the
island’s climate control systems and are
currently investigating the cause.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_020: The forecast didn’t say anything about snow!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_030: This reminds me of Opelucid City...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_060: Hey, Hilda! Is it snowing over there?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_070:
Yup. We put our battle on hold, since this
snow wasn’t on the calendar!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_080:
They’re saying it’s a strange phenomenon,
but the cause is still unknown.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_090: I’m gonna check it out with N and others.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_100:
Oh, that’s why you called! I’d be happy to
join you—
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_130:
I heard everything, Hilda! We’re gonna go
help them, right?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_140:
...Sorry! Actually, there’s something else I
need to do!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_160:
Hilbert, can you take care of things
over there?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_170:
I have some stuff I need to take care
of here!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_180:
Got it! We’ll figure out what’s causing
the snow!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_190:
You sure you don’t wanna meet up
with them?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_200:
It’s OK! If Hilbert and the others are there,
the investigation’s in good hands!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_210: What we need to prioritize first...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4004_1001_220: is making sure everyone here feels safe!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_010: It’s OK, everyone! No need to worry!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_020:
My friends are looking into the snow
situation!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_030:
They’re all super strong and reliable,
so no matter what, we’re gonna be OK!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_050: Yeah! Nemona here is a Paldea Champion.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_060: And Nate’s a Pasio Neo Champion!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_070:
Y-yeah! And don’t forget Hilda!
She’s strong, too!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_080:
We’ll prove it to you right now—with a
battle!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4005_1001_100:
Let’s warm ourselves and our hearts with a
Pokémon battle!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1101_010:
While Hilda’s group was heating things up
with a Pokémon battle...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1101_020:
Hilbert’s group continued to investigate the
peculiar weather.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1001_030:
We found some leads sooner than expected,
thanks to everyone pitching in!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1001_040:
Based on our intel, folks noticed a chill
coming from that direction.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1001_050:
I can hear some unsettling sounds coming
from inside.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4006_1001_060:
I think it’s safe to assume something in that
cave is causing the disturbance.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_020: It’s been getting darker and darker.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_070:
It’s different from the Kyurem you left with
me, Hilbert.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_080: And it’s not Ghetsis’s Kyurem, either!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_100:
Also, what’s that Pokémon it’s battling?
I’ve never seen it before!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_110: It looks like Virizion...but it’s different.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_120: Kyurem’s cold air’s getting even colder!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_140:
Wait... Could this be what’s causing all
that snow?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_150: Then I guess we have no choice.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_160:
We might have to get a little rough and use
force to stop it!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_170: That does seem the only way.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4007_1001_180: Let’s battle this chill with fire, Hilbert!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_010:
The cold air’s letting up. It seems it’s
calmed down.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_020:
That Virizion-looking Pokémon isn’t gonna
attack us, is it.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_030:
It was battling to stop Kyurem. That’s why
it’s cooperating.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_050:
If we leave it like this, it’ll freeze things
again, and that’d be tough on Kyurem!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_060:
Indeed. It’s closed off its heart, so I can’t
hear its voice.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_070: Hilbert! Don’t get too close! It’s dangerous!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_080: I’m sorry, Kyurem. You must’ve been scared.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_090:
This is an artificial island called Pasio.
Here, people and Pokémon get along
and live together.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_100:
If you kept rampaging, Pasio would’ve
frozen over. That’s why we had to stop you.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_120:
If you don’t like it here, I can help you get
back to your home world.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_130: But if you wanna stay...we’ll protect you.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_150:
I’ll protect whatever future you want to
live in!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_170:
Wow, Hilbert! Can you talk to Pokémon now,
like N?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_190:
I think your feelings got through, even if it
couldn’t entirely understand you.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_200:
It seems Kyurem’s chosen to stay with you,
Hilbert.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4008_1001_230:
If that Pokémon hadn’t been here, the snow
would’ve spread a lot more.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_020: Got it! I’ll let everyone know!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_030:
Hey, everyone! Sounds like Hilbert’s group
figured out what caused the weird weather!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_050: Whoa! I’ve never seen that Pokémon before!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_060:
It looks almost like Bianca’s Virizion...but kind
of different.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_070:
So mechanical... It must be one of those
future Paradox Pokémon Florian told us
about!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_080: I’d love to battle it, but it looks exhausted.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_090: D’you think it just battled someone?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_100: At a closer look, it seems partially frozen...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_110:
Maybe this is the Pokémon Hilbert said
helped them battle Kyurem?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_130: I guess it did what it could to help!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_150:
You must’ve fought your heart out! Feeling
any better?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_160:
Whoa! I think it’s challenging you to a battle,
Hilda!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_170: But we just got you healed up...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_180: I guess you and I think alike!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4009_1001_190: All right! I accept your challenge!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_010: Hilbert filled me in on what happened.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_020:
I hear you did your best to put everyone
at ease, Hilda.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_030:
I only did what I could! Nemona and Nate
helped, too!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_040: Plus, I had an amazing encounter!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_070:
We battled fair and square and got to know
each other better!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_090: Thanks, Nemona! You must be Florian, huh?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_110:
So, I just HAVE to know... Do you know
what Pokémon this is?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_120: Yup! It’s most likely Iron Leaves.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_130:
It’s a Paradox Pokémon from the future,
or so they say!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_150:
How curious! I wonder if it’s related to
Virizion!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_160:
And I guess that Pokémon over there is the
Kyurem that was producing all that cold air?
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_180:
That means two special Pokémon met on
Pasio and battled each other.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_190:
Something strange must’ve happened here.
Something paranormal!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_200:
C’mon, Hilbert! Let’s battle with our new
partner Pokémon!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_220:
Why not? I bet Iron Leaves and Kyurem
wanna settle the score, too!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4010_1001_240: As long as that’s what they want...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_020:
I’d like to celebrate our two new
Neo Champions!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_030:
I’m sure many of you may already know,
but the other day, when we had that
weather disturbance...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_040:
Hilda reassured everyone it’d be OK, and
Hilbert connected with the Pokémon behind
the disturbance—which resolved the issue.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_050:
They didn’t just battle. They took action
to protect the future of people and
Pokémon alike!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_060:
It doesn’t look like this excitement will let up
anytime soon...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_070:
so why don’t we give the audience more of
what they want!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_080: This time, WE’LL be your opponents!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_090: You don’t have to twist my arm!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_100: If N’s going with that Pokémon...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_110: then we’ll work together and take them on!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_120: Look at you two, both fired up and ready!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_130:
Yeah! We’ll go all out to protect everyone’s
future.
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_140: That’s what we have to show them!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_160:
To connect the present to the far-off future
Iron Leaves came from...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_170:
I have to protect that future—in which
everyone can live together with a smile!
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_190:
A world in which people and Pokémon can
help each other and live together...
episode_event_90_toya_toko/4011_1001_200: That’s the future we’re fighting for!
